amendment.description: Amendment requires the Congressional Budget Office to prepare an annual report that compares budgeted entitlement spending to actual entitlement spending for the preceding fiscal year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 108-566 to require the Congressional Budget Office to prepare an annual analysis that compares budgeted entitlement spending to actual entitlement spending, with an account-by-action breakdown to show spending trends and variances.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kirk amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 289 - 121 (Roll no. 310).
